sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects the execution of "forfiles" with the "/c" flag.
While this is an expected behavior of the tool, it can be abused in order to proxy execution through it with any binary.
Can be used to bypass application whitelisting.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Tim Rauch, Elastic, E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Use Short Name Path in Command Line
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid command-line detection
